poverty.description: Essential requirements for a decent living encompass various aspects of life, including access to basic necessities like clean water, nutritious food, and adequate shelter. Additionally, quality healthcare, education, safety, and meaningful employment opportunities are vital for well-being. A supportive social environment and the ability to participate in cultural and recreational activities also contribute to a fulfilling life. Ultimately, decent living conditions enable individuals to thrive physically, mentally, and emotionally.
